1.0.name: wordpress/service-updates-for-customers
1.0.description:
SUC (services updates for customers) is a plugin which auto update the subscriber for service updates through email. The customer first subscribe for your services and then he/she should be notify if admin post new comments on any service. you can check the Demo here

Features:

WordPress Integration

  • Easy to install WordPress plugin
  • Works with any standards compliant WordPress theme
  • Plays well with other Plugins
  • 100% Customizable =
  • Easy to modify templates
